name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (swsandra, CalitoRivero, jaoc1811)
description:
Treasure Hunter is a sailing game where you have to collect treasures scattered around different seas. During your adventures you will have to avoid some obstacles, including rocks, whirlpools and even enemies.

This game was made for 32bit jam 2022.

Controls:

  • W or Up Key to move forward
  • S or Down Key to stop
  • A or Left Key to turn left
  • D or Right Key to turn right
  • Space to throw hook when there is a treasure nearby

Credits:

Music:

Pirate Music Album - 050418 by GWriterStudio- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/pirate-music-album-050418-1184...
